content.title: Production-Ready Next.js 16 Starter
content.subtitle: Built with TypeScript, shadcn/ui, and best practices
content.description: A modern, type-safe boilerplate featuring Next.js 16, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4, comprehensive testing, and bilingual support (EN/AR) out of the box.

instructions.line4: Customize content and translations in messages/en.json and messages/ar.json

framework.label: Next.js 16 + React 19
framework.description: Latest stable versions with App Router and Server Components

typescript.label: Strict TypeScript
typescript.description: Enhanced type safety with strict compiler options

ui.label: shadcn/ui + Tailwind v4
ui.description: Beautiful, accessible components with modern styling

navigation.nexcnDescription: Next.js starter with shadcn and next-intl
navigation.nextjsDescription: The React Framework for the Web

footer.description: Production-ready Next.js 16 starter with TypeScript, shadcn/ui, comprehensive testing, and bilingual support.
